Label.text: 2) Each player has his/her own bank to deposit/withdraw money. Player must be at base to use bank.
3) When a player dies, he/she drops all carrying money (not money in the bank) to the ground. Any heroes can pick up the gold.
4) When time ends, which team has more gold in bank wins.
5) If tie, one extra minute is added.
6) Shops at bases only sell basic items. All other items must be purchased through the shop in the middle.
